member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.GetAsync(System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the basic movie information for a specific movie id.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.SearchAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Search for movies by title.
Discover movies by different types of data like average rating, number of votes, genres and certifications. You can get a valid list of certifications from the /certifications method.

member.summary: Get the reviews for a particular movie id.

member.summary: Get the lists that the movie belongs to.

member.summary: Get the cast and crew information for a specific movie id.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.GetVideosAsync(System.Int32,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the videos (trailers, teasers, clips, etc...) for a specific movie id.

member.summary: Get a list of rated movies for a specific guest session id.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.GetPopularAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the list of popular movies on The Movie Database. This list refreshes every day.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.GetTopRatedAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the list of top rated movies. By default, this list will only include movies that have 10 or more votes. This list refreshes every day.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.GetNowPlayingAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the list of movies playing in theatres. This list refreshes every day. The maximum number of items this list will include is 100.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.GetUpcomingAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the list of upcoming movies. This list refreshes every day. The maximum number of items this list will include is 100.

member.summary: Get the alternative titles for a specific movie id.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.GetKeywordsAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the plot keywords for a specific movie id.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.GetReleasesAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the release date and certification information by country for a specific movie id.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.GetTranslationsAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the translations for a specific movie id.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.GetChangesAsync(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get a list of movie ids that have been edited. The maximum number of days that can be returned in a single request is 14.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.GetAccountRatedAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the list of rated movies (and associated rating) for an account.

member.summary: Get the list of favorite movies for an account.

member.summary: Get the list of movies on an accounts watchlist.

member.summary: This method lets users rate a movie. A valid session id or guest session id is required.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IMovieInfo.SetFavoriteAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)

member.summary: Add or remove a movie to an accounts watch list.

member.summary: Search for TV shows by title.

member.summary: Discover TV shows by different types of data like average rating, number of votes, genres, the network they aired on and air dates.

member.summary: Get the primary information about a TV series by id.

member.summary: Get the latest TV show id.

member.summary: Get the primary information about a TV season by its season number.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetEpisodeAsync(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the primary information about a TV episode by combination of a season and episode number.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetIdsAsync(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the external ids for a TV series by id, TV season by its season number, or TV episode by combination of a season and episode number.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetCreditsAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the cast & crew information about a TV series. Just like the website, we pull this information from the last season of the series.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetImagesAsync(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the images (episode stills) for a TV series by id, TV season by its season number, or TV episode by combination of a season and episode number. Since episode stills don't have a language, this call will always return all images.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetSimilarAsync(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the similar TV shows for a specific tv id.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetVideosAsync(System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the videos that have been added to a TV series (trailers, opening credits, etc...)

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetTranslationsAsync(System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the list of translations that exist for a TV series. These translations cascade down to the episode level.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetOnAirAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the list of TV shows that are currently on the air. This query looks for any TV show that has an episode with an air date in the next 7 days.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetAiringAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the list of TV shows that air today. Without a specified timezone, this query defaults to EST (Eastern Time UTC-05:00).

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetPopularAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the list of popular TV shows. This list refreshes every day.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetTopRatedAsync(System.String,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the list of top rated TV shows. By default, this list will only include TV shows that have 2 or more votes. This list refreshes every day.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IShowInfo.GetChangesAsync(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get a list of TV show ids that have been edited. The maximum number of days that can be returned in a single request is 14.

member.summary: This method is used to retrieve the basic information about a TV network. You can use this ID to search for TV shows with the discover.

member.summary: Add or remove a TV show to an accounts watch list.

member.summary: This method lets users add new movies to a list that they created. A valid session id is required.

member.summary: This method lets users delete movies from a list that they created. A valid session id is required.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IListInfo.ClearAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Clear all of the items within a list. This is a irreversible action and should be treated with caution. A valid session id is required.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.IListInfo.DeleteAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Delete a list by id.

member.summary: Get the basic information for an account. You will need to have a valid session id.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.ISystemInfo.GetCertificationsAsync(System.Net.TMDb.DataInfoType,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the list of supported certifications for movie and/or tv shows.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.ISystemInfo.GetConfigurationAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get the system wide configuration information. Some elements of the API require some knowledge of this configuration data.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.ISystemInfo.GetTimezonesAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.ISystemInfo.GetJobsAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Get a list of valid jobs.

member.name: T:System.Net.TMDb.ServiceClient
member.summary: Contains the various API operations for the service client to interact with The Movie Database.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.ServiceClient.LoginAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: This method is used to generate a valid request token and authenticate user with a TMDb username and password.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.ServiceClient.GetSessionAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: This method is used to generate a session id for user based authentication, or a guest session if a null token is used. A session id is required in order to use any of the write methods.

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.ServiceClient.FindAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: The find method makes it easy to search for objects in our database by an external id. For instance, an IMDB ID. This will search all objects (movies, TV shows and people) and return the results in a single response.
member.remarks:
The supported external sources for each object are as follows:
Movies: imdb_id
People: imdb_id, freebase_mid, freebase_id, tvrage_id
TV Series: imdb_id, freebase_mid, freebase_id, tvdb_id, tvrage_id
TV Seasons: freebase_mid, freebase_id, tvdb_id, tvrage_id
TV Episodes: imdb_id, freebase_mid, freebase_id, tvdb_id, tvrage_id

member.name: M:System.Net.TMDb.ServiceClient.SearchAsync(System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Search the movie, tv show and person collections with a single query. Each mapped result is the same response you would get from each independent search.
